name: RegistryHandle
description: The RegistryHandle class represents a handle into an Internet registry or community-specific database.  The handle is specified in the element content and the type attribute specifies the database.

registry.name: registry
registry.description: The database to which the handle belongs.  The default value is 'local'.  The possible values are:

ext-registry.name: ext-registry
ext-registry.description: A means by which to extend the registry attribute.  See Section 5.1.
